ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityState if widget.ProviderWidget <> None and (widget.ProviderWidget.Entity == None or widget.ProviderWidget.Entity.State == EntityState.Initialized): widget.Hidden = True return
registro = widget.Entity if registro == None: return status = int(registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value) liberado = registro.Fields["LIBERADO"] statusEmElaboracao = 1
if (((status == statusEmElaboracao) and liberado) or (status > statusEmElaboracao)): widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False
